General.Name: Kaulin Mfg
General.Description: Kaulin Mfg. Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, and sells industrial sewing machines in Taiwan and internationally. The company's products include overlock; interlock; mulit-needle double chainstich; lockstitch; electric button holing; button sewing/bar-tracking; 4 needles 6 threads feed-off-the-arm flatseamer; and other machines, as well as automatic sewing machines. Its machines are used in stitching various products, such as knitwear, jeans, and sportswear. The company was founded in 1965 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 128, Minsheng E. Rd., Taipei, Taiwan
